title: Quick Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil water and cook pasta according to package instructions
Heat olive oil in a pan and saut√© minced garlic
Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes
Mix cooked pasta with tomato sauce
Garnish with fresh basil and serve

title: Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice
Place cheese between bread slices, buttered sides out
Heat a pan over medium heat
Cook sandwich for 2-3 minutes each side until golden

title: Simple Rice Bowl
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Scramble eggs in a pan with a little oil
Add cooked rice to the pan with eggs
Add soy sauce and sesame oil
